alert.note: Alert for Finney; Ford; Hodgeman; Kiowa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 28 at 3:30PM CDT until April 29 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Dangerous Wildfire Threat Friday Afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 8 PM CDT FRIDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 063...064... 078 AND 080... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM to 8 PM CDT Friday. * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 063 Finney... Fire Weather Zone 064 Hodgeman...Fire Weather Zone 078 Ford and Fire Weather Zone 080 Kiowa. * Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
